entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thundershower. High 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Risk of a thundershower early this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low 11. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023
